requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard or dedicated sound card
  • VR Support: SteamVR, Meta Quest 2 (via Link using OpenXR)
  • Additional Notes: At minimum, you need a GPU that can drive VR at 90Hz reliably. For Quest 2 on PC, users can connect via Oculus Link/Air Link and use OpenXR runtime. A consistent USB 3.0 connection or a stable Wi-Fi setup (for Air Link) is recommended.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700K / AMD Ryzen 5 3600 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2070 / AMD Radeon RX 5700 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard or dedicated sound card
  • VR Support: SteamVR, Meta Quest 2 (via Link using OpenXR)
  • Additional Notes: Recommended for a smoother experience at higher framerates/resolution. Ensures better performance for high‐resolution textures and more demanding visual features.
